BAM_news.title: Major Update – New Map & New Gameplay Features!
BAM_news.content: Expected: 13-10-2025 – Indian Tractor Offloading gets its biggest update yet with new towns, improved physics, and Ombrador–Velmora border crossing missions.
BAM_news.author: ADVENTUROUS MIND GAMES

BAM_news.title: Game Change into the Off Roading Simulation
BAM_news.content: Expected: 13-10-2025 – The game is evolving into a full offloading simulation experience, featuring realistic cargo handling, dynamic terrain challenges, and expanded tractor customization.
BAM_news.author: Abhijeet Patil

BAM_news.title: New Cargo Types – Heavy Machinery & Livestock
BAM_news.content: Expected: 13-10-2025 – Transport heavy machinery to Los Dieselur factories and livestock to Ombrador’s rural markets.
BAM_news.author: Abhijeet Patil

BAM_news.title: Map Expansion – Lak Novograd Fully Playable
BAM_news.content: Expected: 13-10-2025 – Explore the hilly town of Lak Novograd with tight mountain turns and special delivery missions.
BAM_news.author: Abhijeet Patil

BAM_news.title: Performance Improvements & Bug Fixes
BAM_news.content: Expected: 13-10-2025 – Optimized loading times, improved heavy cargo physics, and fixed community-reported issues.
BAM_news.author: Mahendra_B
